org.apache.fop.fonts
Class Glyphs

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.fop.fonts.Glyphs
Deprecated. Use the Glyphs class from XML Graphics Commons instead!

public class Glyphs
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a number of constants for glyph management.
